resources.string:
Periodical 0.8
by Arno Welzel

Calculation of fertility according to Knaus-Ogino

WARNING: It is not recommended to use this calendar to avoid pregnancy! There are more accurate methods, like measuring the basal body temperature.

To indicate the first day of the period, just tap the day in the calendar. To remove the entry, tap again.

The red squares indicate the days of the period. The green days indicate the calculated fertile days. The current day is marked with a circle. Light red days are the calculated future cycles. The calculation is done for two cycle in advance.

To use the data backup, a memory card must be present.
Do you want to backup the current data to the memory card?\nThis will replace the last backup!
Do you want to restore the last backup from the memory card?\nThis will replace the current data!
Mark this day as \"Period has started\"?
Remove the \"Period has started\" mark for this day?
